title: It's a Mad Mad World 1963 (175min) 1990 Restoration
description:
In 1990, MGM/UA Home Video released a widescreen restored 174-minute video version of the film on VHS and LaserDisc incorporating 20 minutes of the deleted footage that was available at that time, and including a documentary about the making of the film.

The same company again released the movie on VHS five years later in stereo, letterbox, with a running time of 182 minutes (which includes the 20 minutes of extra footage, the opening, intermission and exit music sequences), bonus trailer, but without the documentary.




It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World 1963

Director: Stanley Kramer

Starring: Spencer Tracy, Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Buddy Hackett, Mickey Rooney 




Runtime: 3:01:45  (The opening, intermission and exit music)
